CA.name: Mario Kart™ 8
CA.description: Feel the rush as your kart rockets across the ceiling! Race upside-down and along walls on anti-gravity tracks in the most action-fueled Mario Kart™ game yet! Take on racers across the globe and share videos of your greatest moments via Mario Kart TV. Driving up a waterfall or across the ceiling can provide an intense adrenaline rush, but that’s not all anti-gravity is good for. It also provides a wild new gameplay mechanic: if you collide into other racers in zero-g, you’ll earn speed boosts worth bragging about. Luckily, you can upload and share your best moments and watch your friends’ using the all-new Mario Kart TV. Returning features include 12-player online play, gliders, underwater racing, motorbikes, and custom karts. You can even race as Bowser’s seven minions, the Koopalings! Discover amiibo™, a brand new way to interact with your favorite characters and games. Tap amiibo figures to the Wii U™ GamePad controller and watch them come to life in Mario Kart 8 for Wii U. They can also be used in different games in different ways. Visit amiibo.com to learn more about upcoming amiibo figures and compatible games. Receive special racing suits for your Mii™ character based on each amiibo character's look. Dress up your Mii like fan-favorite characters such as Mario, Yoshi, Kirby or even Samus Aran. Currently compatible with the following amiibo figures: Bowser™, Captain Falcon, Donkey Kong™, Fox, Kirby, Link™, Luigi™, Mario™, Mega Man™, PAC-MAN™, Peach™, Pikmin & Olimar, Rosalina, Samus, Sonic™, Toad™, Toon Link, Villager, Wario, and Yoshi™

MX.name: Mario Kart™ 8
MX.description: ¡Vive la emoción de la velocidad al correr invertido y en las paredes en pistas antigravedad en este frenético juego de Mario Kart™! Juega con corredores de todo el mundo y comparte tus mejores momentos en Mario Kart TV. La antigravedad otorga una nueva y emocionante forma de jugar que va más allá de conducir en una cascada o a través de los techos: ¡choca con otros en cero gravedad para obtener un turbo impresionante! Luego publica y comparte tus mejores momentos y mira los de tus amigos a través de Mario Kart TV. Juego en línea para 12 jugadores, superala, carreras bajo el agua, motos y karts personalizados son algunas de las funciones que regresan. ¡Incluso podrás elegir a uno de los siete koopalines de Bowser!
